definitions.definition: Delighting in or feeling pleasure from the pain or humiliation of others.
Of behaviour which gives pleasure in the pain or humiliation of others.
Causing a high degree of pain or humiliation.

main_definition: Delighting in or feeling pleasure from the pain or humiliation of others.
secondary_definitions: Of behaviour which gives pleasure in the pain or humiliation of others.
( colloquial ) Causing a high degree of pain or humiliation.
